subTitle: 사용자의 다음 행동을 먼저 생각하고, 자연스러운 경험으로 구현합니다
intro_tagline: 커피와 노트북만 있다면, 언제 어디서나 즐겁게 일하는 4년차 프론트앤드 개발자 김도영입니다.
favorites_quote: Willingness to take intelligient risks in the pursuit of your clearly defined goals, put you on a greater side of life. Enabling you to archive the same level of success in 1 or 2 years, which may take other people10 or 20 years to archieve, if lessed focused.
bio_desc: As a software developer, I enjoy using my obsessive attention to detail, my unequivocal love for making things, and my mission-driven work ethic to literally change the world. That's why I’m excited to make a big impact at a high growth company.
